message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1300000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1350000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $1250000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still not willing to go below $1300000. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $1280000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your last concession, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
